message: Let's split it 60/40. It's a good deal for both of us in the first round.
I think a 60/40 split is more fair, considering the money will lose value quickly. Let's split it evenly in the next round if you decline this offer.
I understand your point about the decreasing value. How about a 55/45 split? It's closer to even but still gives us a slight advantage considering we proposed first.
